mapper.insert: insert into srv_restaurant ( `id`, `name`, `chain_code`, `province`, `city`, `area`, `addr`, `health_level`, `contact`, `phone`, `landline`, `in_time`, `logo_path`, `bus_license`, `hygiene_license_path`, `status`, `remark`, `login_name`, `password`, `balance`, `auto_receipt`, `pack_fee`, `bus_hour_start`, `bus_hour_end`, `is_all_day`, `lng`, `lat`, user_id, user_name ) values ( #{id}, #{name}, #{chainCode}, #{province}, #{city}, #{area}, #{addr}, #{healthLevel}, #{contact}, #{phone}, #{landline}, #{inTime}, #{logoPath}, #{busLicense}, #{hygieneLicensePath}, #{status}, #{remark}, #{loginName}, #{password}, #{balance}, #{autoReceipt}, #{packFee}, #{busHourStart}, #{busHourEnd}, #{isAllDay}, #{lng}, #{lat}, #{userId}, #{username} )
mapper.delete:
delete from srv_restaurant where id in
#{id}
